DOC.brief_title: Cellular Humoral Immunity Elderly After Immunization With Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine
DOC.criteria: adult ( ≥65 year ) , sex , willingness sign write informed consent form age 65 year status post japanese encephalitis , TBE , dengue , yellow fever West Nile virus infection previous immunization yellow fever , japanese encephalitis ( dengue WNV ) current acute infection ( body temperature 37,9°C )
